alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued January 23 at 3:50PM PST until January 24 at 8:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM PST TUESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 8 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will gradually diminish late this afternoon, though a few gusts around 40 MPH will continue until 5 PM.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
